algorithm_technique: Iterative merging using a dummy head and two pointers.
problem_summary_simple: Combine two sorted linked lists into a single sorted linked list.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively merge two sorted linked lists by comparing node values and appending.
key_insights: A dummy node simplifies the process of building the new merged list, avoiding edge cases for the head.
Two pointers iterate through the input lists, comparing values to decide which node to append next.
After one list is exhausted, append the remaining part of the other list.
